quests.name: The Mistress of All Evil
objectives: Explore the Beanstalk Marshes around Maleficent's castle.

Explore Everafter and complete the three Fairy Tale Trials to reach Maleficent's castle.
  ‧ The Wolf of the Wilds.
  ‧ Teapot Falls.
  ‧ Knights of the Round Table.
Talk to Maleficent inside her castle.
Find Maleficent's missing Spinning Wheel and Throne in her castle, then place them back in the main room.

Place all of Maleficent's furniture back where it belongs.
  ‧ Maleficent's Throne.
  ‧ Maleficent's Candelabra.
  ‧ Maleficent's Fire.
  ‧ Maleficent's Spinning Wheel.
Pass through the portal to Maleficent's throne room.
